post.title: "memory card error" in canon powershot g11
post.content: hey guys, need bit of your help. actually last night i formatted my sd memory card of canon powershot g11 and after that when i inserted that card to the camera again it is displaying - "memory card error". after that all the crap is happening i don't know what to do? please help me out, i have some very precious photos in that card. thanks in advance.
